entry.title: DeFi Tokens Defy the Dip as Ethereum Slips Below $1,300
entry.summary: Running counter to the broader crypto market’s bearish price action, DeFi tokens have posted gains over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Binance CEO: Bitcoin Bear Market Is 'Healthy' for Crypto Industry Long Term
entry.summary: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao told the crowd at the Mainnet conference to “ride out the winter.”

entry.title: Draft EU Law Could See NFTs Regulated as Securities: Law Prof
entry.summary: Crypto law commentator Brian Fyre interprets the draft bill as treating blue-chip NFT PFP collections like Bored Apes as securities.

entry.title: Ethereum NFTs Are Driving Crypto Adoption in Central and South Asia: Report
entry.summary: Of all the crypto-related web traffic in the region, more than half of it is going to NFT sites.

entry.title: Kraken CEO Jesse Powell Steps Down to Focus on Crypto ‘Industry Advocacy’
entry.summary: Jesse Powell is stepping down from his role as CEO of Kraken, citing the drain of managing operations and how the role had become “less fun.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips as Fed Again Raises Interest Rates to Combat Inflation
entry.summary: Volatility hits the crypto market as the Fed raises interest rates by 75 basis points, meeting market expectations.

entry.title: Australia’s Financial Watchdog Expands Team to Better Regulate Crypto
entry.summary: After last week's merge event, Australia's financial regulator ASIC is also weighing whether to classify Ethereum as a financial product.

entry.title: Hacker Saves Abritrum From Ethereum-Draining Bug in Nitro Upgrade
entry.summary: A bug in the latest upgrade for Arbitrum, an Ethereum scaling network, had been live for almost three weeks, but had not yet been exploited.

entry.title: gm: Inside NFT Unicorn Magic Eden With CEO Jack Lu
entry.summary: Magic Eden launched 1 year ago and already has a $1.6 billion valuation. It started as a marketplace only for Solana NFTs, but now it’s opening up to Ethereum. Co-founder and CEO Jack Lu tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about the company’s goals, his take on NFT backlash, Solana vs Ethereum, and the Ethereum merge and its impact on NFTs. Watch and subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Binance and FTX Lead $50M Race to Purchase Voyager's Assets: Report
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and FTX have reportedly made the leading bids for the assets of bankrupt crypto lender Voyager Digital.

entry.title: Judge Orders Tether to Produce Records Showing Backing of USDT
entry.summary: A judge in New York has ordered stablecoin issuer Tether to produce financial documents to assess whether USDT is backed by US dollars.

entry.title: BNV CEO Richard Hobbs on Creating a Fashion-First Metaverse
entry.summary: Web3 fashion startup BNV is building out its own metaverse to better fit the fashion world than the "voxelated" worlds of Sandbox and Decentraland. BNV CEO Richard Hobbs spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz about why it's necessary, ahead of BNV's special event during Paris Fashion Week.

entry.title: Latest Draft of US Crypto Law Would Temporarily Ban Terra-Like Stablecoins
entry.summary: Algorithmic stablecoins would be shelved for two years of study by federal agencies.

entry.title: Magic Eden CEO: ‘Very Natural’ to Expand From Solana to Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: Jack Lu tells Decrypt about the top Solana marketplace’s embrace of Ethereum—and why Magic Eden was “worried” about the reaction.

entry.title: Digital Fashion Platform BNV Will Launch Its Own Metaverse
entry.summary: Company CEO Richard Hobbs says creating fashion-first metaverse BNV World will solve a number of issues.

entry.title: US Digital Currency a ‘Unanimous Need’ to Compete With China: House Committee
entry.summary: All invited speakers agreed that the United States must launch a digital currency to remain globally competitive.

entry.title: Ethereum Classic Plummets 23% Over Post-Merge Week
entry.summary: Both ETC and Ravencoin saw their prices fall double digits.

entry.title: NFT Marketplace OpenSea to Integrate Ethereum Scaling Solution Arbitrum
entry.summary: OpenSea has slated a September 21 launch for Arbitrum, adding to the four existing chains currently on the marketplace.

entry.title: Miners Sold Nearly 15,000 Ethereum Leading Up to the Merge
entry.summary: Ethereum miners appear to have cashed in big leading up to the network’s highly-anticipated merge event last week.

entry.title: How METAT8 Esports Dominated the Axie Infinity World Championship
entry.summary: Axie’s newly-crowned champions speak with Decrypt about Web3 esports and how their competitive focus sets them apart.

entry.title: Binance Expands Stablecoin BUSD to Polygon, Avalanche
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Binance has expanded its BUSD stablecoin to the Ethereum scaler Polygon and the speedy layer-1 blockchain Avalanche.

entry.title: Robinhood Lists USDC as First Stablecoin on Trading Platform
entry.summary: Robinhood today announced that it would be adding the industry’s second-largest stablecoin as part of its crypto push.

entry.title: Microstrategy Stock Drops 6% Amid Latest $6M Bitcoin Buy
entry.summary: The business intelligence firm Microstrategy says it has now spent a total of $3.98 billion on its Bitcoin bet.

entry.title: Helium Founders, T-Mobile Launch Crypto-Powered 5G Mobile Service
entry.summary: Helium Mobile will tap both the decentralized 5G network and T-Mobile’s service while also offering crypto rewards to users.

entry.title: Nasdaq to Launch Institutional Crypto Custody Service: Report
entry.summary: The exchange provider is taking on established crypto players such as Coinbase in its bid to win over institutional investors.

entry.title: ApeCoin Jumps Double-Digits as Staking Program Draws Near
entry.summary: The coin powering Bored Ape Yacht Club’s ecosystem is up over 10% in the last day as its staking program nears its launch.

entry.title: Algorithmic Market Maker Wintermute Hacked for $160M
entry.summary: Wintermute stated that it has no solvency concerns, while issuing an open call to the hacker to engage in a whitehat response.

entry.title: Alameda to Repay $200M in Bitcoin and Ethereum to Bankrupt Crypto Broker Voyager
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto trading firm Alameda Research will return about $200 million in cryptocurrencies to the now-bankrupt Voyager Digital.

entry.title: Tribe DAO Votes to Repay Rari Capital Hack Victims—Again
entry.summary: After voting to make victims of the $80 million hack whole back in May, the community is finally making good on its proposal.

entry.title: SEC Claims All of Ethereum Falls Under US Jurisdiction
entry.summary: In a civil complaint against a crypto influencer, the SEC suggested that it believes the U.S. government has jurisdiction over all Ethereum transactions.

entry.title: Metaplex Set to Airdrop MPLX Tokens to Solana NFT Creators
entry.summary: Metaplex will launch a DAO to enable community governance, with non-U.S. creators set to reap the reward of MPLX tokens.

entry.title: New Bitfarms Operation in Argentina Slashes Costs With Natural Gas
entry.summary: The Canadian mining company says its Rio Cuarto facility has already boosted its hashrate.

entry.title: How Ethereum Traders Actually Played the Merge
entry.summary: One crypto intelligence firm revisits its selloff predictions from a month ago.

entry.title: Ethereum Name Service Regains Control of EthLink Domain in Lawsuit Against GoDaddy
entry.summary: Eth.link was “sniped” earlier this month after an expiration date snafu led to a $850,000 auction.

entry.title: Treasury Asks for Public Input to Shape Crypto Regulations—Including NFTs and DeFi
entry.summary: The Treasury's questionnaire is designed to assess how the government can better address crime associated with crypto.

entry.title: SEC Charges Crypto Influencer Ian Balina Over Unregistered ICO in 2018
entry.summary: The SEC alleges that Ian Balina violated securities regulations when conducting Sparkster’s $30,000 ICO in 2018.

entry.title: WazirX Delists USDC Stablecoin, Converting User Holdings to Binance USD
entry.summary: India’s largest crypto exchange WazirX has followed Binance in delisting three stablecoins and "auto-converting" user balances to BUSD.

entry.title: PGA Tour Golf NFTs Coming to Tom Brady’s Autograph Platform
entry.summary: Autograph will tap into the golf league’s video and data archives to create NFT collectibles, with the help of Tiger Woods.

entry.title: UK Financial Regulator Issues Consumer Warning Against FTX
entry.summary: The Financial Conduct Authority has warned that crypto exchange FTX is not authorized to provide financial services or products in the UK.

entry.title: South Korean Authorities Request Interpol Red Notice For Terra’s Do Kwon
entry.summary: With the Terra co-founder's current location a mystery, South Korean prosecutors have requested that Interpol issue a red notice.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried: FTX Has $1 Billion to Spend on Acquisitions
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried revealed that the exchange has a ‘ballpark billion’ to spend on companies and projects.

entry.title: Ethereum Fork ETHPoW Suffers Bridge Replay Exploit, Token Tanks 37%
entry.summary: The replay exploit took place on a third-party contract, enabling the attacker to make away with 200 ETHW tokens.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?
entry.summary: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs
entry.summary: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler
entry.summary: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)

entry.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs
entry.summary: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.

entry.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas
entry.summary: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.

entry.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto
entry.summary: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.

entry.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood
entry.summary: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.
